name: Escape the Quake
description:
Escape the Quake will put you in middle of a catastrophic situation where buildings are falling and people are getting trapped. You have to save as many people as possible and make sure you don't get hit by a broken block. Every 5 sec there will be an earthquake and buildings will fall.

version: LOVE 11.3 (Mysterious Mysteries)

Will run smoothly on  windows but not so sure about the linux distribution. 

If you seek the .love file you will find it in linux distribution.
